title: Cop Mission 1 bug
body: The Cop 1 mission requires you to use your ult 20 times - it counts separate casts of Jihn's ult as separate casts, so in effect Jihn gets 5 casts out of each ult. I don't have hard numbers on this, but I completed that mission in one game as Jihn and definitely did not ult 20 separate times.

replies.body: Happens with every champ that has multi-stage or spammable ults.
